name: hyperapp-dot-notation-reducer
description: Hyperapp mixin to use dot.notations return objects in actions.
author: Albert Groothedde

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/hyperapp-dot-notation-reducer.js -o dist/hyperapp-dot-notation-reducer.js --mangle --compress warnings=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty -p relative --source-map dist/hyperapp-dot-notation-reducer.js.map
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
